source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 601,184.

Set: Lifebloom's bloom has a 30% chance to apply Insurance! to its target for 10 sec. When Insurance! is consumed or removed, it leaves a missing Rejuvenation, Regrowth, or Wild Growth heal over time effect for 15 sec on its target.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 135,739 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 74,301 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Vault Raider's Crystal Fists

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
